data.name: Neo Spectrum
data.detailed_description:
The system has been compromised, it's your job to restore it.
Neo Spectrum is a 2D puzzle platformer game. Use the properties of the different colored blocks to face numerous puzzles and challenges, starting from simple ones like moving platforms, to advanced ones where you'll have to manouver quickly around enemies, dodge lasers, walljump and even control multiple characters at once.

Blocks


Each colored block has unique properties:
The RED block is dynamic and affected by physics.
The GREEN block is bouncy and can be used to jump higher or bounce red blocks around.
The BLUE block is sticky and can be used to climb and maybe some more advanced tricks.


Colored blocks demonstration.

data.short_description: The system has been compromised, it's your job to restore it. Neo Spectrum is a 2D platform puzzle game. Use different colored blocks to find your way through the nasty viruses.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
